description:
If we exceed the max number of attempts to poll for a VHD, it should kill the pending image in glance.

As of right now, that image will hang in the pending state forever.

We should also revert the vm_state and task_state on the instance along with this.
title: _wait_for_vhd_coalesce doesn't kill image when exception raised

comments.content:

We should also revert the vm_state and task_state on the instance along with this.
